# Project Topic

This project aims to conduct a comprehensive analysis of student profiles using the YOK ATLAS dataset, delving into preferences, achievements, and various characteristics across distinct student groups. This analysis seeks to provide a valuable resource for educational institutions and guidance departments to comprehend factors influencing student success

# Data Set

YÖK ATLAS database is used in this project due to access to large data set in thestats package
